data.name: Sarawak Demo
data.detailed_description:
Sarawak is a literary mystery game set in Oxford and Borneo.

Oxford, England. A university professor is found dead on the steps outside your hotel. The police arrest someone very close to you for his murder.

The dead professor has left behind him a web of secrets that you alone can unravel.

Sarawak is a narrative adventure game that takes you from the dreaming spires of Oxford to the jungles of Borneo as you make interactive choices and solve puzzles in a story that blurs the boundaries between narrative games and conventional literature.

This is a demo of the first two chapters in the game.

For fans of narrative adventure games or old-fashioned mystery novels

Sarawak will appeal to players who enjoyed the likes of 80 Days, A Case of Distrust, LucasArts adventure games or Agatha Christie novels. Sarawak is best described as a narrative adventure, and gameplay is split between interactive text choices and point-and-click puzzles.

Choose your words wisely

Through dialogue choices, you interact with a cast of characters who help or hinder your progress. The more you unravel, the more conflicted you become as you start to question who's lying and who's telling the truth.

Solve puzzles

Discover Sarawak's beautiful and interactive illustrations as you open locks and doors, discover secret rooms, hack into police equipment, pore through newspaper archives, and light up a jungle research station.

data.short_description: Literary mystery game set in Oxford and Borneo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, Steam Linux Runtime
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
